definitions.definition: Any of several plants of the tribe Cassieae , especially those of the genera Cassia and Senna , whose leaves and pods are used as a purgative and laxative .
The dried leaves or pods of these plants (especially of Senna alexandrina , syn. Cassia angustifolia or Cassia acutifolia ), used medicinally.

main_definition: ( countable ) Any of several plants of the tribe Cassieae , especially those of the genera Cassia and Senna , whose leaves and pods are used as a purgative and laxative .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The dried leaves or pods of these plants (especially of Senna alexandrina , syn. Cassia angustifolia or Cassia acutifolia ), used medicinally.
